reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress well-fitting and accurate to the size chart, describing it as elegant and better than expected. Moreover, the dress is comfortable, not itchy, and made of nice fabric, with one customer noting it's breathable. Additionally, they appreciate its versatility for formal occasions, particularly weddings, and like its color. However, opinions about the length are mixed, with some finding it perfect while others say it's a little long. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what I wanted for vocal and cello performance in "concert black"
items.body: I am a musician and purchased this "concert black" dress for a choral performance and a cello performance. It is absolutely perfect for this. The lace on the top is soft and beautiful and not see-through anywhere on the bodice. The neckline is pretty without being too deep. The sleeves are a little more sheer - but still very lovely and conservative. The lace is somewhat stretchy also, so it very comfortable on the arms (ideal for cello performance.) The skirt is full enough for cello, but structured enough so it hangs beautifully. Thanks to the fitted aspect of the bodice, it is quite flattering to the figure. I am very pleased with this dress! Highly Recommend! Read more
items.author: Heather E Carson

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Canâ€™t say enough good about this dress!!
items.body: This dress isnâ€™t just beautiful, itâ€™s comfortable and elegant! The top is a soft lace, not too hot or cold, true to size, and has decent stretch to forgive sizing mistakes, even in the lace. I could have just bought an XL for a comfortable, snug fit. But I went with 2XL and have a little more wiggle room than I need, yet it still looks gorgeous. For reference, 5â€™6â€, a proportional 210, meaning my weight is evenly distributed; meaning I donâ€™t have just a big butt or belly, but everything is spread between thighs, butt, arms, and whatnot. This is an incredible dress, flows like an A-line. Lovely. Read more
items.author: C-Household

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stunning Dress ðŸ¤© Absolutely worth it!!
items.body: I wore this long black lace dress to a wedding and received so many compliments! The fit was perfect and made me feel elegant all night. The fabric feels high-quality and comfortable, and it looks much more expensive than it actually is. The price is amazing for a dress that looks and feels this beautiful. Highly recommend â€” perfect for weddings, formal events, or any special occasion! Read more
items.author: Dan

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Dress as described
items.body: The dress was the second dress made of this fabric. It is heavy and did not flow. The length was good for me at 5fi 7in. The lace is soft and not itchy. The sleeves are nice and not too tight. The V-neck is not terribly low. my main issue is the address what is that? It does not fall into US sizes. I fell between two sizes and went for the larger size which was too big. Iâ€™m sure that the smaller waist size measurements would not have fit me. The fabric does not seem to be very stretchy. Read more
items.author: MEileen

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice dress, didnâ€™t love the skirt portion on me
items.body: The lace is stretchy and fit great. Easy to move in and comfortable to wear. The quality seemed good. The skirt fabric was thicker than I was hoping for but it was good. The dress will look good on some people but I need a full skirt. I feel like the two pleats on each side of center puckered and just the placement made me look broad. I thought about sizing up but the top fit well and I simply wasnâ€™t a fan of the skirt style. For me it wasnâ€™t flattering. Loved the high rounded back. Many dresses I find have a deep/low back showing off most of whatâ€™s above the bra line. Nice dress if you look good in this type of skirt. Read more
items.author: AL

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars NOT LIKE THE PHOTOS! Sheer, short, & less lining
items.body: The photo of the dress is VERY misleading. We're very disappointed with what we received versus what we expected, so we're returning it. We bought this for our daughter for orchestra concerts, but it's not gonna work. First, the dress is sheer. Like, we held it up against a wall, and I could still see the wall through all 4 layers of the skirt (2 layers, front and back). I didn't take a photo of that since I'm not sure my camera would see the difference, but be aware it's not as thick as it seems and probably would not work with stage lighting. Second, it's VERY short. It's shown to be an ankle-length dress in the photos, but on my 5'4" daughter, the bottom was 2 inches below her knee. You'd have to be 4'11" and shorter for it to be ankle-length, but even then it wouldn't fit you in the shoulders because the shoulders were very wide, even though we bought a size Small. There is NO way this is the same dress on that model who's probably 5'7"+. Third, the photo makes it look like it's only sheer lace in the sleeves (from the shoulders down) and lined everywhere else, but from the bust up, it's all UNLINED. This is not at all what was advertised. Be warned. Read more
items.author: kriz

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful Dress
items.body: Ordered this as a last ditch effort to get a dress for an even. Prime delivered it within 2 days! The dress was not wrinkled, or smell, and had it's tag (so not used). For reference I am 5'5 and weight fluctuations between 140-145. I normally use size M or L in shirts depending on the material, 6/8 in jeans. I ordered this dress in a Large to play it safe, since it is a stretchy material I probably could have done M but I like to be comfy and not have all my lumps show lol. True to color (Royal Blue). I have only tried it on, haven't used it so will update if dress doesn't stand the test of time. Hope this helps! Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Dress
items.body: The dress is very pretty. True to size. Fits perfect. Looks really good on. Am very pleased with the dress. Disappointed it was used and not new. Read more
items.author: Kindle Customer

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Formal V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Formal V Neck is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Dark Green, Red, 11 Black, Darkblue, 11 Purple, 11 Bright Blue, 11 Darkred. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
